info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 9:50PM EST until January 09 at 4:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST /3 AM CST/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain or drizzle, occasionally mixed with rain and snow. Ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch are likely...mainly on roads and sidewalks. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana, southwest Michigan and northwest Ohio. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST /3 AM CST/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Icy conditions will persist for several hours before temperatures rise above freezing towards morning. Freezing rain or drizzle will transition to all rain after midnight. Minor ice accumulations, slick roads, and a few accidents have already been reported this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages.
